originalText.text: I needed a place fix watches near me that was reasonable. I had a collection of vintage wrist watches that were not valuable but very retro. I found Mark Livak Expert Watchmaker on line and went to see him. I was pleased to find out he was very fair when it came to watch restoration and watch strap replacement. I have been bringing my watches to him a few time and have been satisfied with the service.

text.text: I needed a place fix watches near me that was reasonable. I had a collection of vintage wrist watches that were not valuable but very retro. originalText.text: I have had watch strap replacement done at this shop several times and have always been satisfied with the results and the cost. Mark Livak knows exactly what watch strap replacement goes with every watch according to the era the it was made. I had one that he said was not original and he did a complete watch restoration on it. It looks awesome.

originalText.text: My wife had bought me a Cartier watch when we were first married in the 80s. After a while a little moisture got in it and fogged the face. I put in a drawer and forgot about it for years. One day I found it and brought it to Mark Livak Watch Repair Expert. He cleaned and repaired it and it is now like new. This is a great watch repair shop and I am very pleased with the excellent service.

text.text: My wife had bought me a Cartier watch when we were first married in the 80s. After a while a little moisture got in it and fogged the face. I put in a drawer and forgot about it for years. originalText.text: I brought several vintage Swiss ladies watches to this shop for watch band replacement. They were those tiny watches from the middle of the last century and belong to my wife who inherited them. Mark Livak fit them all with period watch straps and did a watch repair on one that no longer ran. I was very pleased and so was my wife when I surprised her.

originalText.text: It is amazing what a little watch polishing can do for an old watch. Mine had been worn so much that case and the crystal were both scratched up badly. I brought it to Mark Livak Watch Expert and the watch looks like new again. I would recommend this service highly.
